description.english: Clear the main story once.
description.japanese: ゲームを1回クリアする

description.japanese: 1000体の雑魚敵を撃破する

displayName.japanese: あんなに可愛いネズミなのに、なぜ殴るの？
displayName.schinese: 鼠鼠那么可爱为什么要打它

description.japanese: ハムスターメカボールを撃破する

description.english: Defeat Phi
description.japanese: フィエルを撃破する

displayName.english: How Could You Lose? It Was 2-on-1!
displayName.schinese: 二打一都打不过会不会玩？

description.english: Defeat Cappa and Theta.
description.japanese: カッパとシータを撃破する

description.english: Defeat Dark Alpha.
description.japanese: 黒化アルファを撃破する

description.english: Play this game for a total of 2 hours.
description.japanese: プレイ時間が2時間以上

description.english: Earn 100,000 Coins.
description.japanese: 10万枚の星コインを獲得した

description.english: Earn 1,000,000 Coins.
description.japanese: 100万枚の星コインを獲得した

description.english: Unlock all weapons.
description.japanese: すべての武器を解放する

description.japanese: すべてのスキルを解放する

description.english: Dodge 1,000 times.
description.japanese: 回避を1千回行う

displayName.japanese: フィジカルチャンピオン

description.english: Squat 1,000 times.
description.japanese: 1千回しゃがむ

description.japanese: 両手が素手でハムスターメカボールを撃破する
description.schinese: 双手都是空手的情况下击败仓鼠机械球

description.japanese: 両手に近接武器を装備してフィエルを撃破する

description.english: Defeat Cappa and Theta with the Scorch effect.
description.japanese: カッパとシータが燃焼効果で撃破される
description.schinese: 卡帕和西塔被灼烧效果击败

description.english: Defeat Dark Alpha with Alpha.
description.japanese: アルファで黒化アルファを撃破する
description.schinese: 使用阿尔法击败黑化阿尔法

displayName.japanese: 見せびらかす！眩しいほどに

description.japanese: すべてのミルクティーを解放する

description.japanese: 「バナナバスケット」100点以上

description.japanese: ミニゲームでマイナススコアを獲得した

description.japanese: 1万回ジャンプする

description.japanese: はじめてスキルを解放する

displayName.japanese: ミルクティーなしでは生きていけない

description.japanese: はじめてミルクティーを解放する

description.english: Unlock a pet for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめてペットを解放する

description.english: Place a piece of furniture for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて家具を配置する

description.english: Grow crops in the Farm for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて農作業をする

displayName.english: Nothing Beats the Sound of Opening Package

description.japanese: はじめて速達を開封する

description.english: Receive a message for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめてショートメッセージを受信する

description.english: Rescue a pedestrian for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて知らない人を助ける

description.english: Rescue a special character for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて特殊キャラクターを助ける

description.english: Obtain a piece of Legendary equipment for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて金色装備を入手する

displayName.japanese: 手に神器あり、天下は我にあり

description.english: Obtain a  golden weapon for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて金色の武器を入手する

description.english: Obtain a 5-Star skill for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて星5スキルを入手する

description.english: Combine a weapon for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて合成武器をを入手する

description.english: Combine a piece of equipment for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて合成装備をを入手する

description.english: Be defeated 10 times.
description.japanese: 10回死亡する

description.english: Become the victim of an invasion for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて侵入される

description.english: Call a correct number for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて正しい電話番号をダイヤルする
description.schinese: 初次拨打正确的电话号码

description.english: Open 999 chests.
description.japanese: 宝箱を999個開ける

displayName.japanese: ジャンプアクションの日常

description.english: Take fatal damage from a trap 10 times.
description.japanese: トラップで10回死亡する

description.english: Clear a game with maximum Red Hearts.
description.japanese: ハートMAXで1ラウンドのゲームをクリアする
description.schinese: 在红心为满的情况下通关一局游戏

description.english: Reach over 30 STR in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームで力のステータスが30以上になる
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中力量属性高达30以上

description.english: Reach over 30 DEX in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームで速さのステータスが30以上になる
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中敏捷属性高达30以上

description.english: Reach over 30 INT in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームで知力のステータスが30以上になる
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中智力属性高达30以上

description.english: Reach over 15 HP in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームでライフのステータスが15以上になる
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中生命属性高达15以上

description.english: Reach over 15 EN in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームでエナジーのステータスが15以上になる
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中能量属性高达15以上

description.english: Reach over 30 LUCK in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームでラッキーのステータスが30以上になる
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中幸运属性高达30以上

description.english: Trigger a hidden switch for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて隠し装置を起動する

description.english: Stay airborne for 10s without touching the ground.
description.japanese: 10秒間地面に着地しない
description.schinese: 在不落地的情况下持续10秒

description.english: Obtain 10 Hearts that are not Red in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームでレッドソウルハート以外のソウルハートを10個獲得する
description.schinese: 在一局里获得过10颗非红心的魂心

description.english: Buy all the items in the shop 3 times in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームでショップ商品全購入を3回行った
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中买空过3次商店

description.english: Save 999 Coins.
description.japanese: 貯金が999星コインになる

description.english: Use Refresher 10 times in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームでリフレッシャーを10回使用した
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中使用过10次刷新机

description.english: Get an item from the Slot Machine for the first time.
description.japanese: スロットマシンではじめてアイテムを引く

description.english: Pass the Tracking Room for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて追跡ルームを通過する

description.english: Pass the Elite Room for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめてエリートルームを通過する

description.english: Throw grenade 999 times.
description.japanese: 手榴弾を999回投げた

description.english: Obtain 10 pieces of pet equipment in a single game.
description.japanese: 1ラウンドのゲームでペット型装備を10個入手した
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中获得过10个宠物型装备

description.english: Expand the outdoor base for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて屋外の拠点を拡張する

description.english: Clear a stage without picking up any equipment or selecting any skills.
description.japanese: 装備を拾わず、スキルを選択せずにゲームをクリアする
description.schinese: 不拾取任何装备且不选择任何技能的情况下通关

description.english: Equip a different skin for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめてスキンを切り替える

description.english: Enter a Hot Spring Room for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて温泉ルームに入る

description.english: Enter a Story Shard Room for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめてプロット断片ルームに入る

description.english: Be defeated for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて死亡する

description.english: Catch a fish for the first time.
description.japanese: はじめて魚を釣った

description.english: Caught All the Fish
description.japanese: すべての魚を釣り上げる

displayName.japanese: おもちゃの車、ラジコンカー

description.english: Defeat the Terrorist Task Force
description.japanese: 暴力テロ機動隊を倒す

description.japanese: 暴力テロ機動隊が爆発ダメージで倒される
description.schinese: 暴恐机动队被爆炸伤害击败

description.english: Defeat the White Robed Scavenger
description.japanese: 白い服の荒らしを倒す

description.english: Defeat the White Robed Scavenger and Stand Simultaneously in a Short Time
description.japanese: 白い服の荒らしと替え玉が短時間内に同時に倒される
description.schinese: 白袍拾荒者和替身在短时间内同时被击败

description.english: Defeat the Moonlight Flower King
description.japanese: 月光の花王を倒す

description.english: Defeat the Moonlight Flower King While Both Hands Are Firearms
description.japanese: 両手が銃器武器の場合に月光の花王を倒す
description.schinese: 双手都是枪械武器的情况下击败月光花王

description.english: Defeat Sigma
description.japanese: シグマを倒す

description.japanese: シグマがチャージしている魔法を interrupted されて倒される
description.schinese: 西格玛被打断过蓄力施法并被击败

description.english: Defeat Ice Breath Deep Cold
description.japanese: アイスブレス・ディープコールドを倒す

displayName.english: Dragon Slayer Girl Doesn't Follow the Rules
displayName.japanese: 龍殺しの少女は武道を守らない

description.english: Defeat Ice Breath Deep Cold While Both Hands Are Spell Weapons
description.japanese: 両手が魔法武器の場合にアイスブレス・ディープコールドを倒す
description.schinese: 双手都是法术武器的情况下击败冰息深寒

description.english: Defeat Chi
description.japanese: 希を倒す

description.japanese: 希が防御無視状態に入り、倒される
description.schinese: 希进入过破防状态并被击败

description.english: Defeat Starfire Embers
description.japanese: スターライト・エンバーを倒す

description.japanese: スターライト・エンバーが凍結効果を受けて倒される
description.schinese: 星火灭烬受到过冰冻效果并被击败

description.english: Defeat the Lord of the Abyss
description.japanese: 深淵の主を倒す

description.english: Defeat More Than 10 Summoned Minions and Defeat the Lord of the Abyss
description.japanese: 10体以上の召喚された小怪を倒し、深淵の主を倒す
description.schinese: 击败10个以上召唤的小怪并击败深渊之主

description.japanese: 偽・黒石コアを倒す

displayName.japanese: 誰が本当のボスなのか？

description.japanese: 1分以内に偽・黒石コアを倒す

description.japanese: 隠技システムを初めて触発する
description.schinese: 触发过一次隐藏组合技能

description.japanese: 二周目を一度クリアする
